Considering its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an excellent chance to acquire a product that's worth more than $150 elsewhere, and we're confident it will exceed your expectations. We hope you'll take advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
